articles.title: 'We are ready to go:' COVID-19 vaccination could begin Tuesday in Washington, Inslee says - Q13 FOX (Seattle)
articles.description: The first COVID-19 vaccinations in Washington state could be administered Tuesday, Gov Jay Inslee said.
articles.content:
OLYMPIA, Wash. - The first COVID-19 vaccinations in Washington state could be administered Tuesday, Gov Jay Inslee said.
“We are ready to go,” Inslee said at a news conference Sunday.
